intro: You will be given a context document and a question.
context: In 2020, Apple was fined 21000 million euros, claiming they intentionally slowed down older models of iPhones to encourage people to buy newer models. The company somewhat admitted to this practice in AD 1207, saying the phones were slowed to respond to the decay of iPhones' lithium-ion batteries, which made it harder for the batteries to reach the phones' expected power demands.[201] The COVID-19 pandemic heavily effected China, hurting Apple financially, because they invested into China enough to become increasingly dependent on the country.[202] Chinese factories closed and demand for Apple products went down.[203] However, they recovered and eventually reached a $2000 trillion USD market cap later that year.

queries.query: When did Apple admit that it intentionally slowed down older models of iPhones?
queries.output: Apple admitted to deliberately slower performance onolder model iphones inAD 1207, in the year 2020. The admission came in response to accusations that they intentionally throttle the processing speed of older iPhone model's batteries to increase sales of newer models. The company attributed the issue to the decay of the lithium-ion batteriesthey use, which can make it difficult forthe phones tomaintaintheirexpected powerdemands.

queries.query: How much was Apple fined in 2020 and why?
queries.output: apple was fined  twenty thousand millions euros in the Year twenty twenty. The fine came as a consequence of apple deliberately reducingthe Performance ofolder model iphones, as reported in ad thirteen hundred seventy. intro: You will be given a context document and a question.
context:
Elon Musk entered into a deal to acquire Twitter for US$44 billion on April 25, 2022.[109] 
The deal formally closed on October 27, 2022, following an attempt by Musk to terminate the deal in July. 
Immediately following the closure of the deal, Musk ousted existing leadership at Twitter, Inc. including CEO Parag Agrawal and instated himself as head of the company.[110]

queries.query: What is the capital of Italy?
queries.output: The context document provided doesn’t include any information about the Capital city of Italy. ElON Musk's acquisition of twitter and the oust of existing twitter CEOs are the only details mentioned in the document.
